Resumo:
I have been a programmer for 8 years and have been studying formally since 2016. I studied IT at FAETEC's technical high school with a focus on Java software development, a language in which I have more practice and experience. I am currently studying Computer Science at CEFET/RJ. 

My current goal is to move from my current internship in data science at TCU, to a software developer internship or job, witch was my initial goal 8 years ago. 

 I have knowledge and experience with Java, Python, SQL, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, Git, SQL, MongoDB and agile methodologies.

Experiencia Profissional.Descrição: Providing assistance in data mining and management of structured data using the following tools/technologies: Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Numpy, SQL, Excel, Power BI

Experiência Voluntária.Descrição: The course is taught in C/C++ and aims to teach the concepts of data structure and search and sort algorithms.
